title: I just came across an old (1941) postcard for sale on Ebay with a picture of the Blue Top Lodge & Cabins, Highway 17, Wilmington, NC printed on it. Where exactly was the Blue Top located? The picture showed a gas station/restaurant in front and small cabins behind it. Is this where Lloyd\'s Storage/Car Lot/UHaul is currently located?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8234
